statements: SELECT * FROM match_schedules
SELECT match_id, match_date, location FROM match_schedules
SELECT match_id, opponent_team FROM match_schedules WHERE location = 'Stadium A'
SELECT * FROM match_schedules WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT opponent_team, location FROM match_schedules ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT * FROM match_schedules WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT match_id, opponent_team FROM match_schedules WHERE opponent_team = 'Real Madrid'
SELECT location, match_date FROM match_schedules WHERE location LIKE '%Stadium%' ORDER BY match_date DESC
SELECT * FROM match_schedules ORDER BY match_date ASC, location ASC
SELECT match_id, opponent_team, location FROM match_schedules WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY match_date
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_id = 1;
SELECT match_date, opponent_team FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT match_id, location FROM MatchSchedule ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_city, team_country FROM Team WHERE team_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Team WHERE team_city = 'New York' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_country FROM Team WHERE team_country IN ('USA', 'Canada') ORDER BY team_country DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_city, location FROM Team JOIN MatchSchedule ON Team.team_name = MatchSchedule.opponent_team;
SELECT team_name, team_city, location, match_date FROM Team JOIN MatchSchedule ON Team.team_name = MatchSchedule.opponent_team WHERE match_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule;
SELECT match_date, location FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT opponent_team, location FROM MatchSchedule ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Venue WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT team_name, count(*) FROM Team GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_id, match_date, opponent_team FROM MatchSchedule WHERE location = 'Stadium A' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, count(match_id) FROM MatchSchedule JOIN Team ON MatchSchedule.opponent_team = Team.team_name GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT venue_name, city, country FROM Venue WHERE city = 'New York' OR country = 'Spain';
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY match_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule;
SELECT match_date, location FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_city FROM Team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT venue_name, venue_city FROM Venue WHERE venue_city = 'New York';
SELECT match_id, result, winner_team_id FROM MatchResult WHERE winner_team_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule ORDER BY match_date DESC, location ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_city FROM Team WHERE team_city = 'New York';
SELECT match_id, result, team_name AS winner_team_name FROM MatchResult JOIN Team ON MatchResult.winner_team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT venue_city, COUNT(venue_id) AS venue_count FROM Venue GROUP BY venue_city HAVING venue_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM MatchSchedule WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Matches;
SELECT match_id, match_date, location FROM Matches WHERE match_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT team_name FROM Teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Players JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id;
SELECT location_name FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Matches;
SELECT team_name, player_name FROM Teams INNER JOIN Players ON Teams.team_id = Players.team_id;
SELECT match_date, location, opponent_team FROM Matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_name, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM Teams INNER JOIN MatchResults ON Teams.team_id = MatchResults.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, team_name, location_name FROM Players INNER JOIN Teams ON Players.team_id = Teams.team_id INNER JOIN Locations ON Teams.team_id = Locations.location_id;
